downloadDescription: This poster highlights the architecture and feature set of Microsoft Exchange Server 2007.
detailsSection:
Aside from showing the high-level architecture, this poster highlights the feature set of Exchange Server 2007. Sections include:

  • Management and Monitoring

  • High Availability

  • Client Access, Edge Transport, Hub Transport, Mailbox, and Unified Messaging server roles
systemRequirementsSection:
• The poster is a .pdf file and you will need Adobe Reader to view it.

  • When printed, this poster measures 30.5 inches by 20.5 inches.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or choose a different language from the drop-down list and click Go.

  2. Do one of the following:


    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.

    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
